content: Logo for the Login page and emails

comment.text: This translation key is used for the "LogoLogin" description in branding settings. It will appear next to a logo in the login page and email interface, providing context for users about what the logo represents.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Greek translation uses a period (.) after 'Σύνδεσης'. While not strictly incorrect, it's more natural to omit it in this context, especially considering this is a key name/label.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Λογότυπο για τα μηνύματα ηλεκτρονικού ταχυδρομείου και τη σελίδα Σύνδεσης

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Logo sisäänkirjautumissivulle ja sähköposteihin" is a bit literal and could be improved for naturalness. 'Sisäänkirjautumissivulle' (to the login page) implies movement, which isn't necessary. 'Sähköposteihin' is correct, but could be rephrased to be more concise.
The translation 'Մուտք գործելու էջի և էլ. նամակների պատկերանշան' is a literal translation and could be improved for naturalness. "Logo" doesn't always directly translate to "պատկերանշան".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Մուտք գործելու էջի և էլ. նամակների համար պատկերազարդ" or "Մուտք գործելու էջի և էլ. նամակների գլխավոր պատկեր".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Japanese translation "用于登录页面和电子邮件的标志" is Chinese, not Japanese. It translates to 'Logo for the login page and emails' in Chinese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: The translation should be in Japanese. A possible translation would be: ログインページとメールのロゴ (Login peeji to meeru no rogo).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Logótipo para a Página de Início de Sessão' is a literal translation and doesn't fully capture the meaning of "Logo for the Login page and emails." It omits the reference to emails. A more accurate translation would include this.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Logótipo para a Página de Início de Sessão e emails

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'පිවිසීමේ පිටුවට හා වි-තැපැල් සඳහා ලාංඡනය' is a literal translation but doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'Logo for the Login page and emails'. A more natural phrasing would emphasize that it's a logo *used* for those purposes.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පිවිසීමේ පිටුවට හා වි-තැපැල් සඳහා යෙදෙන ලාංඡනය

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'වි-තැපැල්' is commonly used but 'විද්‍යුත් තැපැල්' (vidyut thapael) is the more formally correct Sinhala term for 'emails'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පිවිසීමේ පිටුවට හා විද්‍යුත් තැපැල් සඳහා ලාංඡනය

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Логотип за Пријава страницу и емаил-ове" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "Logo for the Login page and emails". "За" can sound awkward here. "У" or "на" would be more common.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Логотип за страницу за пријаву и имејлове

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "емаил-ове" is a mixed spelling. It combines English and Serbian. 'Имејлови' is the correct Serbian term.
The word 'email-ove' is not the most natural or accurate translation for 'emails'. It's a genitive plural form, which is grammatically correct but stylistically awkward in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Logotip za Prijava stranicu i mejlove

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '用于登录页面和电子邮件的标志' is too literal. A more natural and idiomatic translation would convey the purpose of the logo.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 登录页面和电子邮件的Logo
